item.title: Touristr Beta Seriously Impressive
item.description: Jan Blanchard has been building a great travel site called Touristr for quite a while. I did some beta testing for him a while back and the potential was obvious. With their latest open beta, they’ve really improved the look and navigation of the site. In their own words: I think they have a winner on their hands. Check it out here.
